H0.text: which organelle is the site of atp production and storage. Chloroplast

H1.text: which organelle is the site of atp production and storage. Endoplasmic Reticulum

H2.text: which organelle is the site of atp production and storage. Golgi Apparatus

H3.text: which organelle is the site of atp production and storage. mitochondrion

A4.text: Mitochondria have a double membrane structure and use aerobic respiration to generate adenosine triphosphate (ATP), which is used throughout the cell as a source of chemical energy.

A5.text: The matrix is important in the production of ATP with the aid of the ATP synthase contained in the inner membrane.
